question: When were the Sassi of Matera recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
asked_question_translated: Kad Materas Sassi tika atzīts par UNESCO Pasaules mantojuma objektu?
answer: Materas Sassi tika atzīts par UNESCO Pasaules mantojuma objektu 1993. gadā.
answer_translated_eng: Matera Sassi was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1993.
